What will you do?

155.content: How about a story about Eisen's Navel Fetish.
155.title: A navel story

info.brief_description: Play around with a cute, tomboy Cobalion-morph by doing whatever you want to her!
info.description:
Eisen is a 7' 5'' in. Cobalion Anthro, with a cute and chubby belly, perky breasts, and nice, squeezable buttocks. Her face is entirely Cobalion-like, save for her black, bed-head hair. the areas on her fur that should be white, are actually black. She has a B-cup, no bigger than baseballs, coated in her iron-like, cyan flesh. all with pointy white nipples to finish the job.

Eisen is a tomboy, and mostly hangs out with male Pokemorphs, especially those smaller than her. she also is known to have a navel fetish and even a pregnancy fetish. Eisen is an easy going girl, and gets along with others just fine. but if she's enraged, she won't pull any punches.

Here's a small list of her friends.

Victor, a mostly strong and muscle bound Houndoom-morph, and one of Eisen's best friends

Francis, a girly-looking Virizion fem-boi, and Eisen's "Polar Opposite"

CD, a nerdy and slightly fem-boish (not as much as Francis, tough) grey Keldeo-morph who has a crush on the Cobalion
--
I'm pretty lenient on rules here, so experimentations are welcomed in. just no cruelty to Eisen and her friends, and no death to said characters either. other than that, have fun!
